pages.text: $(l)Hacksilver$() is the fundamental resource in this mod, serving as the primary currency for trading with the esteemed dwarven craftsmen, $(l:entities/huldra_brothers)Brok and Sindri$(). $(br2)This versatile metal can be discovered within the depths of overworld caves or hidden within the mod's dungeons. $(br2)Additionally, there exists a chance for Hacksilver to be obtained from the fallen $(l:entities/draugrs)Draugrs$(), making it a valuable and sought-after commodity in your adventures.

To transform ordinary $(l)Hacksilver$() into a truly valuable currency, it must be processed into ingots. $(br2)Each ingot is smelted from one $(l)Compressed Hacksilver$(), which can be obtained by combining four $(l)Hacksilvers$() in a crafting table.
